1.title: Eddie Leonski

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer looks at the case of Eddie Leonski a U.S. Army soldier and serial killer who strangled to death three women in Melbourne, Australia. He claimed to be driven by a desire to steal women's voices. Although the crimes were committed on Australian soil, Leonski is sentenced to death at a general court-martial in 1942.

2.title: Angus Robertson Sinclair

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer looks at the case of Angus Robertson Sinclair who killed two teenage girls in Edinburgh, Scotland in 1977. He is put on trail, but later acquitted in 2007 under controversial circumstances. Later, suspect of other murders he is retried and convicted of murdering the two girls.

3.title: Anders Brevik

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer looks at Anders Brevik a far-right Norwegian spree killer and terrorist who was responsible for the 2011 Norway attacks where he killed 77 people at a Workers' Youth League summer camp. He claimed to be driven by political and racist motives against immigrants.

4.title: Surinder Koli

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer looks at the case of Surinder Koli who murdered 19 children in Nithari Village near New Delhi, India from 2005 to 2006. Trained as a butcher in the country, he moved to the city where he used his talent to dissect children. A psychologist discusses the pathology of the so-called Slumdog Cannibal who killed his victims before eating their remains.

5.title: Mark Erin Rust

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer looks at the case of Mark Erin Rust a serial killer who killed two people in Adelaide, South Australia from 1999 to 2001. Rust suffered from Klinefelter syndrome and became a sexual pervert interested in exposing himself to women. He later escalated to murder after one of his victims mocked him.

6.title: Stephen Griffiths

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer looks at the case of Stephen Griffiths who from 2009 to 2010 used a crossbow to murder three women in Bradford, England before begin apprehended and put on trial for his crimes. Fascinated with serial killers, Griffiths targets prostitutes out of a desire to become a famous murderer.

7.title: Joanna Dennehy

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer looks at the case of female serial killer Joanna Dennehy who murdered three men in England in March 2013. She used promises of sex to learn her victims to her and then stabbed them eventually discarding their bodies in ditches outside of Peterborough.

8.title: Israel Keys

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer looks at the case of Israel Keys a serial killer who went through extraordinary measures to avoid detection and makes use of long-buried murder kits in his numerous crimes. Linked to at least eight deaths, Keys commits suicide shortly after he is arrested.

9.title: Anthony Sowell

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer looks at the case of Anthony Sowell who was arrested in 2009 after the bodies of eleven women were discovered at his home. Known as the Cleveland Strangler he lured his victims to his home were he raped and killed them.

10.title: Michel Fourniret and Monique Olivier

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer examines the case of Michel Fourniret and Monique Olivier who murdered at least eight people in France and Belgium between 1987 and 2001. The twisted married couple used their own child to help kidnap and murder multiple girls and young woman.

6.title: William Inmon

episode of.title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer (TV Series 2015– )
